ygData.subject: Re: Lambent OPINIONS
ygData.msgSnippet: ... And here s one friend that s grateful for your opinions, Song Brother! I ve engraved your name on my axe. =D I twink any younger bard I see who has a
ygData.messageBody:
> I am not for/against twinking. I do it,
> I've done it, it's happened to me, it's happened for me.

> Harmonic.

And here's one friend that's grateful for your opinions, Song Brother! I've
engraved your name on my axe. =D
I twink any younger bard I see who has a polite aire about him/her and a
genuine love for the singing profession.

As for Lambent, I'll get it when the time is right, but have no plans to
even go for a bracer for a few levels. Bronze been berry berry good to me.

Operaman Overtone
Meandering Maestro of the 20th Song
<Spirit of the Moon>
Innoruuk
